name: David Leach
overview:
David Leach is the founder of Consultoria Inc (2009 to present), a Digital Production Agency the focuses on Cinema Production, Web development, iOS and Android application development.
David Leach is the co-founder of Soap SEO a technology startup that provides Search Engine Optimization services, Online Reputation Management, Domain Authority reporting and web development. He serves a dual role as the company's Chief Marketing Officer and Chief Product Officer overseeing a staff comprised of several former Google
